EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_New Jersey_Q118.GP Summit - Green - 2/27
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us for Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf 2018 in April
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://greenplumsummit.io/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You're invited to attend Greenplum Summit <[[http://greenplumsummit.io/]]>, an event dedicated to Greenplum Database, at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018]]>. It’s all happening April 16-20 in Jersey City, and we want you to be part of it! We have tons of great sessions planned - including a conference keynote by Greenplum original co-founder Scott Yara, presentations by Greenplum customers GE Digital, Morgan Stanley, and Conversant, and pre-conference training. At Greenplum Summit you’ll examine customer case studies, develop new skills through in-depth tutorials, share emerging best practices in Postgres-based data analytics, and envision the future of data technology while networking with your peers.
Save 25% off your conference pass A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Use code 2018_GPDB to get a 25% discount when you register <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2018/buytickets]]>. Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter #GreenplumSummit, and follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> for news and updates. I hope to see you there, Jacque
